title: Looking for people to join our team for the Oceanic Open Ladder!
body:
Hey we want gold/plat + rank.
This is going to be a serious Ranked team
Please fill this in for a chance to join.

IGN:
Age:
Can you use Voice coms?:
Rank:
Favourite Lane:
Favourite champs:
Are you Mature?:
Why should we pick you?:

MID AND SUPPORT IS ALREADY TAKEN

Thank you!

replies.body: Jump on http://RetreatHellGaming.com we have plenty of New Zealand and Aussie players wanting to make ranked teams.

IGN: WintersBlade
20
Anything as long as everyone uses it too i.e ts Skype etc 
Rank: g4 highest g1
Don't have favorite lane because i can play all lanes and most champs so no fuss 
Champs: any if haven't played will learn quick
Mature: Depends on you guys
Why pick? I don't know you either want to or not we can be friends or not up to you guys really :)

IGN: Golden Acorn
Age: 16
I can use skype. 
Rank: Gold V, highest rank Gold IV.
Favourite Lane: ADC
Champion Pool: Tristana, Lucian, Caitlyn, Corki, Ashe (can use most adc's decently though)
Mature: Yes.
Why should we pick you: Free carry/ I'm keen to join a team and learn jokes better than that. I really enjoy competitive play in higher elo's and this would give me an opportunity to taste that feeling.

IGN: BackFire

Age: 18

Can you use Voice coms?: yes

Rank: gold 5

Favourite Lane: adc/mid

Favourite champs: syndra/caitlyn/zed/riven

Are you Mature?: yes

Why should we pick you?: 
Never been banned, never been muted I am a relaxed player who plays the game to have fun. I have played since season 1 and I am confident in my own abilities and decision making. I never surrender and believe its never over until a nexus explodes. As for my attitude towards their team and ours I live by this motto; "Never look down on someone, unless you're helping them up."
Hey ive added you. My Summoner's name is FRULT
